content.detailedDescription:
How are you?

on monday 6th of june 2014, i woke up early because of a brush fire in the everglades.
miami was covered by a thick smoke as a fog.
took my camera(hv40 canon) and went on the beach around 630am.
i came back and from my windows, i could see the sun rising and really red , i guess because of the smoke.
i recorded about 6mn from my windows. i was zooming on the sun.

i captured the video through hmdi. got a big computer!
i imported the footage in adobe premiere pro. the film reveals suns spots!!! super cool!!!
so i was looking to take the best snapshots, to post on fb, when i suddenly went over 2 very particular frames.
2 dots appears against the sun(there are not sun spots!!) on the left(north) on the first frame. they appear to follow each other as mosquitoes going through your lens. that what i thought it was first but the zoom would have blurred the mosquitoes so much that i wouldn't even see them!!
the next frame, well, only 1 dots left... and it had moved on the right of the sun(south).

i am a graphics design, video editor and motion graphic designer. i also produce multicam live broadcast over the net.

i do not know what it is but i would like to know!!!

i have attached the 4 following/consecutive frames. footage was shot at 30 fps on dv tape. 

let me know if you need anymore details.

thanks for your time.
hope to hear from you soon
content.summary: Looking at a video i shot  frame per fram, i have extracted pictures on which i want explanations

content.detailedDescription:
On july 11, 2014 between the hours of 8:45 and 9:00 pm lasting roughly 30-45 minutes, my family and i witnessed a series of reddish-orange lights flying over the treetops while camping in lebanon, maine.  

we were standing in the middle of a field in the campground while our children were participating in an activity when i noticed out of the corner of my eye a formation of lights become visible over the treetops.  at first glance i would gather there were about a dozen or more of these lights flying in formation, some in a straight line and others in a single file behind the other formation.  at first, i figured that it may be a formation of helicopters returning from a military exercise.  there was music playing so i was not able to hear any noise coming from them, hence the reason for believing it was just a helicopter formation.

after about 10 minutes of witnessing these lights, and as the event wrapped up, the music stopped, at which point i noticed for the amount of objects i was witnessing, there wasn't a single bit of noise coming from them at all.  at this time, there were well over 20-25 of them passing overhead in varied formations and the noise would have been rather loud for a helicopter formation.  my girlfriend, son and myself were looking at these objects and i said that there was no way that what we were seeing was a helicopter formation as they were completely silent.  i kept telling them that this was not normal to not hear a single sound for the amount of objects we were seeing.  all the time while watching these lights, as they became distantan as bright as they were, they suddenly dimmed out as if they weren't there.

after about 20-25 minutes, the activity had seemed to slow down as we were all walking back to our campsite, however looking up at the sky they were coming at roughly 15-20 second intervals in a single file formation once again still no noise.  at this point i started to get a little of that uneasy feeling because i could not explain what it was that i was seeing.  

we made it back to camp and lit our fire, meanwhile you could still see what i would describe as "stragglers" coming about every 2 minutes or so.  what finally made me realize that what was happening wasn't normal, the last light i saw through the trees was flying at a different direction more to the right of the original formations, then came to a stop and made an abrupt "course correction" to the left where the other objects were seen going.  

i tried to film these objects when i got back to camp as i left my phone there charging in my vehicle, however the quality of the phone and the thick canopy of the trees would not allow me to capture these on video.
content.summary: Multiple circular objects, some in formation and others not

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was relaxing on my sun deck at 3pm that day. i noticed two lights moving around each other about a mile or so in the sky. it was hard to tell from that distance if i was seeing two objects moving around each other or one object with two lights on the side spinning. after about 5 minutes it only appeared as one object that hovered in place. i was starring so much that my partner tried to get a look but couldn't see that far away. she said i can't see what your looking at but i can see that. at that point i stopped focusing on what i was originally looking at and saw an object moving to my right and traveling west to east. it had the same speed as the airplanes that are constantly going  over head toward seattle. i pulled out my cell phone in a race to get a video but picked my camera option by mistake and got a photo. i quickly got the video camera going and started filming it. it moved at a consistent speed toward the original object i had observed. it finally stopped and hovered close to the original object. they sat in the sky for 3 hours before i could no longer see them.

the a picture is the one i got before i managed to get the video going.

the b picture is of the two objects hovering in the sky. they were so high up that you will have to zoom way in but they are located near the top left of the image and are very small. 

i have had 29 sightings over the last 25 years. all have been from victoria and it's surrounding municipalities.
content.summary: Two daylight ufos over victoria b.C

content.detailedDescription:
The event start it at 1 am june 5th ,2014.
my friend woke up at 6 am in the alley behind his building, which could not understand how he got there, he notice that on his chest are burning mark look like rash which he did not have it the night before.
(even after 50 days the marks still there). he contact me and told me the story of his which he has no history of sleep walking or anything like that he is a healthy 44 years!
i was in disbelieved and did not take him serious but i told him if this was a abduction you are going to have headaches, nightmare and bleeding  from his noise. which after 30 years of interest in this subject and 90% of stories you read or watch is about typical grey's abductions!
mike contact me the day after and said that he had a dream that he is in the sky and 4 creatures which the are hologram's and all look like a beautiful blond with the red lipstick and black dress surrounding him and the one behind him have 2 long fingers of him on top of his head and talking to him telepathically and saying to him that don't worry we are putting something in your stomach which you may be a little uncomfortable but in a long run it will be good for you! next thing that he remember is falling from sky which usually taking around 15 seconds for him to see himself and coming back to his body and he had a very painful stomach pain that lasted around 3 hours and pain got despaired after that. 
again mike called and told me this story which i told him that mike you are being abducted but when i don't know their style is different because grey's have to come and take you physically but in your case you are getting abducted while you are sleep. since that day i have not let him sleep at his place no more. the night after he had a dream that he is in the same room and the usual 4 are around his bed and this time there is a female on top of him and facing the other way having intercourse with him which he panicked and woke up and tried to keep himself up which around 6 am he fall sleep again and the same thing happened to him.    
after hearing this story he told me that even though they are hologram but their hand when its move its not hologram (at this moment that i thought he is going to say that their hands are light gray and very slim which in my surprise said their hands are light green and its like lizard. i was so shocked and amazed that he was getting abducted by reptilians and that's why their style is completely different than greys. my next move was finding a hypnotherapist that could hypnotize him that we have that as a prove and also know what happened to him which on same evening they talk to him again he was in the sky and usual 4 surrounded him and the one in the back of him have 2 fingers on top of his head and talking to him telepathically and said to him that mike we are watching you in a long time ( which in the recent abduction told him that we watched you on your first life and we abducted you on your second, third, and this is your 4th life ). they told him that why you think your mom is still alive( the doctors told her mom that she had only 3 months to live 6 years ago because of cancer) and she is very well now.
then they talk about me that in the begging they used to call me  (best friend) that have lots of knowledge regarding different kind of aliens.   they told him that we will bring you up tomorrow and we will have a surprise for you.
this ongoing events which will be 40 to 50 more pages which i cant even mention some of them due to public is not ready for that .................
i just want to share just one of many amazing things that they could do is that their technology after one billion years is so amazing that i am watching him is deep sleep but when his breathing change he is gone and wherever he land he has a physical body also! one soul and two body  something that we cant accept it at this time of our technology but its true.....
content.summary: This is reptilian abduction with no ufo sighting involve !

content.detailedDescription: This sighting occurred on friday, july 25, 2014 in the town of lamas - san martin, 22 km (30 minutes) from the city of tarapoto. on a walk by a family where were my daughter and her friend and the mother of this. the friend of my daughter was the one who took the photos from the camera phone of his mother around noon, taking several photos, including capturing images attached to this report. the next day when they went to check out the photos that were taken during the ride got this surprise.
content.summary: It is something inexplicable. it would be interesting that the two images were analyzed before and after in the same place

content.detailedDescription: My ex and i was driving along main road when we observed a bright light in sky,we drove towards her mothers house which was where the light was observed at ,as we neared her road i saw 2 beams of light scanning the field adjacent to the road we were travelling on,i shouted to stop the car where upon i watched the beams of light for about 3 minutes at about 100 feet distance,i told my ex i was going to get a closer look but she freaked and started screaming to get back into the car,at that moment a string of little white lights spiralled from the object which meant it was time to leave.I was pumped and excited at the moment of seeing this in front of me but my ex was visibly shaken,i think i would have approached right under the beams.
content.summary: Observed 2 beams of light emiting from object apparently searching field,then observed a string of white light spiral from object

content.detailedDescription: I already reported 2 sightings and a boy from your unit called me. i was not going to see him, but i changed my mind and agreed to meet with him after i show the markings to my dr. at the va. last night i had the same thing happen to me and now i have triangle on my left arm which is below the zee  mark and is completely different from my bruises as i told your investigator. i know you all think us old people are senile or something that is why i didn't want to be contacted unless someone told you the same truth. when he called me i had been drinking and even told him about my experience out in the country and so unless you hear from someone else i prefer not to contacted. i would rather you all put into another report just like the gov't does.
content.summary: Another strange mark on body

content.detailedDescription:
On july 25th,i was driving my car on the nj turnpike traveling northbound at approximately 3:30pm. i entered the nj turnpike on exit 4 and had been driving northbound for approximately 10-30 minutes when i saw a ball/oval shaped object traveling at a high rate of speed directly in front of me in the distance. it ascended very rapidly and made a slight turn which caught my attention, then it traveled directly towards me. as i traveled northbound it traveled southbound directly over the nj turnpike. off in the distance was a small airplane carrying one of those big beach advertisments. the object was between me and the plane in the distance ( i remember the plane being yellowish or light in color). i would think the plane would have been able to see the object too as it looks like the object originated very close to where the plane was. i did not see any wings on the object, when i saw it i was a bit surprised and didnt know what it was, i estimate it as about the size of a helicopter although it was a ball shape it had no tail like a helicopter would. i turned my radio down and opened my window as the object quickly approached but i heard no noise as i typically would if it were a helicopter. the whole event from the moment i saw the object until it passed over me was probably no more then 8 seconds, it was very quick.

i am the son of a retired pilot. cars, motorcycle, helicopters, planes, hot-air balloons all interest me and i am familair with many common shapes and sounds they all make and i can say with confidence i have never seen anything like this.

the only thing i can think of is that perhaps it was a large unmanned drone? but i saw no markings on it as well as no way it could fly such as wings or helicopter style blades.
content.summary: I saw a ball shaped object flying while i was driving.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out window saw a large white object hovering, and then moving behind trees. it was very big, no sound. i did not sleep at all .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw large white object stationary, then moved behind trees.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving southbound on himalaya just before midnight on 7/22/2014. just as we approached the intersection at chenago, a dark shadow streaked across in front of us about 100 feet in front and ~100 feet above. there was no other traffic and as the object was about 3/4 the way across my field of vision, the reflection of the street light reflected off of the side of it. that is when i caught a glimpse of it, just before it disappeared into the darkness. it appeared to be a black sphere large enough to hold two people. the exterior was shiny and the speed it was going made the reflection look more like a camera flash. the whole thing lasted about 1 second. i saw out of the corner of my eye that my wife jumped from the flash. i asked her if she just saw that. she replied "i saw something fly by and then the flash"
content.summary: Dark sphere flying at high speed with no sound or lights just above the treetops

content.detailedDescription:
I was just getting off of work when i witnessed up in the sky a strange purple light that seemed to just be hovering and then all of a sudden came another light which was red and it was also hovering and rapidly changing directions. i thought that i was the only one witnessing this when a coworker from a distance still inside the gates if the yard where i work at yelled do you see the lights in sky!? 
i was relieved that i wasn't the only one witnessing this...I decided to pull out my phone camera and start recording what i was seeing...It all happened so quickly and i was just in shock not believing what i was seeing that i didn't realize i was filming upside down...But if you notice once i zoom in on the video that there you can see the orb type lights and they start forming a triangle...By that time there were three lights. they all start pulsating and changing colors randomly from purple to red to green..Etc.
there are other coworkers at my job that stated they saw the ufo's as well. 
the strangest thing was that when i went to a friends house that same night it occurred a friend of his mentioned he witnessed as well. 
then my friends mother also witnessed it. another friend happened to be in a park nearby that night the sightings occurred and also witnessed it and got some really good video footage of the sighting...
many people are telling me that they could just be drones but what i witnessed that night and all the other people that witnessed as well know that it couldn't be no drone or anything man made...

this is all too creepy wierd...
content.summary: Coming out of work i witnessed ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I was at work in jackson around 1 i took lunch it was a very hot day we were having a heat wave so i went out back an looked up at the sun then i saw a giant ring around the sun pulse the sun was showing a lot of activity on it the flames were very visible so i took my phone an started taking picks probably 6 picks when i looked at the pics i noticed a dark object behind the sun plus two times larger.So i got a job working for nasa the following wknd and they also seen it they were doin research on the sun when i was there an discovered the black spots i have spoken to some of the scientists an wow.
content.summary: I witnessed a giant sphere taking energy from the sun an i took pics of it.

content.detailedDescription: Odd change of direction contrail.  object soared into high altitude climb!
content.summary: Seen in the morning sky!  odd directional change?

content.detailedDescription:
During the summer of 1992 (june-july), while i was temporarily assigned aboard a u.S. navy ticonderoga class guided-missile cruiser in the persian gulf, i saw a black, equilateral triangle-shaped aircraft with three bright, white lights, one in each corner, flying directly over our ship. our ship was part of the uss independence carrier battle-group, and at the time of the sighting we were underway in the central or southern persian gulf. the sighting occurred sometime between midday and 3pm local gulf time, though i cannot recall the exact date or day of the week, and it occurred at the tail-end of an underway replenishment (unrep) exercise between our ship and the carrier. i���d learned a few minutes earlier while i was at my workstation inside that our ship was very shortly going to pull up alongside the aircraft carrier to carry out an unrep. having never seen one of these exercises, i���d made my way topside in order to get a better view of the activities, and i ended up well above decks at the upper-most and most forward location of the ship that i could reach. this put me somewhere atop the forward superstructure above the bridge and very near the ship���s main mast. 

our ship was moving at approximately 10-20 knots and pulled alongside the independence to begin the unrep drills involving both vessels being attached to one another by lines, cables, and fuel hoses. the two ships maintained a set distance between one another while matching each other���s course and speed. weather conditions at the time were good and typical for the region in june and july. it was mostly sunny with scattered clouds. as is typical of the region, the air was very thick with a haze caused by the high humidity. the air temperature was in the upper 90s to near 100 degrees and visibility seemed limited to just a few miles, i���m guessing three to four miles at most. there were several other sailors around me when the sighting occurred, some sightseeing and others working various assigned tasks. 

the sighting started by my first hearing a deep, almost thunderous roar that was, at first, difficult to discern insofar as its point of origin. the next few seconds before actually sighting the aircraft were spent quickly glancing around to try and figure out where the sound was coming from. i spend a lot of time describing the sound below because it played such a prominent role in the sighting, at least initially. the roar sounded close but not too close. that is to say it was very similar to being near an airfield when jet fighters take off at full power and fly over you as they depart the area. in that case, for example, the viewer might be some distance away from the airbase, say, maybe a mile or two. there was a doppler-shift to the sound. approximately three to five seconds elapsed between first hearing the aircraft and when i realized that the sound was actually coming from overhead. this confusion was due to the fact that there was so much going on around me at the moment. the ambient environment was full of other loud noises of all types, including the high-pitched whine of the gas turbine exhaust from the ship���s main powerplant, the rushing or whishing sound from the filtered air intake feeding the powerplant (which is, i believe, a dc-10 engine down-geared to drive the main shaft), plus the sounds of men shouting, bullhorns or speakers blaring, and so forth. as loud as the environment already was, this new thunderous sound, which seemed like a pulsing sort of roar, seemed to overpower all the other sounds around me. it was very strong, and i felt it in my chest as much as i heard it, and it was as if it was pounding my body. 

my first thought was that the sound was coming from aircraft launching from the carrier right beside us, though i knew this couldn���t be the case during an unrep. from my vantage point i could also see several parked aircraft on the starboard side of the carrier���s flight deck. i���d noticed that all of the aircraft were parked, many with wings folded and tie-down chains clearly attached, and it was clear that no fixed-wing flight operations were underway. i also quickly glanced back aft on the carrier to where the jet engine testing racks are located. it briefly occurred to me that squadron mechanics might be running an engine up in one of the test stands, which i���d personally seen a couple years before during desert shield while temporarily assigned to the independence. there were no indications there were any engines being tested for lack of hot vapor signature or smoke. my quick visual survey had lasted just three seconds or so before finally looked directly overhead.  

the aircraft i saw was black, triangle-shaped (like an equilateral triangle) with brilliantly white, round lights or spots inset within each of the three rounded corners. the aircraft appeared to be moving at around 250-500 mph on the same general heading as that of our two underway vessels, which i took to be roughly n/ne at the time based on the sun's position. the sun was above and behind me on my left. the aircraft appeared to be climbing out, though not on a steep ascent, but rather gradually climbing to a higher altitude after, perhaps, taking off from somewhere not too far away. it definitely wasn���t descending, and it didn't appear to be on an approach vector for landing. this aircraft was almost directly overhead our position and seemed to have flown right up our wake. 

though mostly sunny, the high temperature and high humidity caused my view of the craft to be somewhat less that crystal clear in that it wasn���t a hard or crisp, deep black color. nonetheless, i could easily tell it was black and the view was certainly sharp enough to discern the distinct triangle shape and rounded corners. all three sides appeared equal in length. the shape and color was stunning enough to me, but the three extremely bright, circular spots on its underside were baffling. they were exceedingly bright to the point that they seemed to pierce through the high-heat haze in the sky. in fact, they were dazzling in their brilliance, though not as bright as a welding arc. there was no condensation or exhaust trail of any kind that i could tell, plus i got the immediate sense that the aircraft wasn���t at all high enough to produce a vapor trail. i could not make out any control surfaces, such as vertical tail/s, fins, canards, etc. as for size, the aircraft was as wide as my little finger with my arm fully extended (see attached powerpoint illustration, of which there are two slides, one depicting the sighting from my position and the other depicting a zoomed view). 

i immediately knew that i was seeing something radically different from anything i���d ever seen before. i was absolutely stunned by what i saw. i���d studied aircraft and aviation history since my early childhood, and i���d spent most of my time in the navy working in the aviation community, aboard a carrier, around airfields, etc. i stayed current with aviation developments for years by reading various publications, including jane���s defense weekly and aviation week & space technology. i immediately knew this was not a b-2 spirit or f-117 nighthawk. 

my view of this aircraft lasted between 5-10 seconds, and about midway through the sighting i noticed that others standing near me were also looking at it with several guys yelling out as to what it could be. we were all just standing and looking in amazement (see note below). the deep rumbling sound had seemed to fade away a bit. although the initial roar or rumbling sound was the audible cue that had initially alerted me to the aircraft���s presence, the sound seemed to fade or change from the deep roar to something less distinctive. it was hard to hear due to the other noises i described earlier. in other words, the roar faded away and we were left with the ambient environmental sounds of the ships power plant, the activities going on around us, and the aircraft passing overhead and moving away. 

our view was suddenly and almost violently interrupted by an ear-shattering series of blasts from the ship's horn which, unbeknownst to me at the time, was located very close by. these sudden horn blasts were so loud that i physically cringed, bent over, and brought my hands up to cover my ears. i yelled out in pain along with several others, and we scattered to get away from the horn. i asked what the horn was all about and was told that it is used to signal the end of the unrep exercise itself, or in the case, to announce the maneuver we went into called emergency breakaway. this was all new to me, but the immediately the crew were set to action to "break the lines���, real everything back aboard, and then each ship soon began a sharp turn away from the other in order to put as much space between themselves in the shortest time possible. i suppose a blast from a ships horn is no big deal to most folks, and it wouldn���t have made such an impact on me either if i hadn���t been standing so close to it and had it not interrupted the most incredible flying craft i���d ever seen. had it not been for that the i might've got a longer view of the aircraft. 

i have discussed this sighting with only a few folks over the years, but i've never formally reported it. i���ve often wondered whether the emergency break-away drill was coordinated to distract people from spotting the aircraft over our heads, though i know that is mere conjecture. the discussions about this sighting have been mostly at work in secure settings where i���d hoped someone might have offered some amplifying information. i���ve even drawn it on a whiteboard for folks, but to date no one that i���ve talked to has ever offered an explanation other than speculating that it was u.S.-developed. a few things are for certain - it was undoubtedly directly overhead a u.S. aircraft carrier battle group underway in the central or southern persian gulf. although the two vessels were engaged in an exercise between them, all the electronic apparatus on both vessels were radiating and rotating, to use a navy expression. the vessel i was on has the aegis combat system and the an/spy-1 radar system. having been personally been inside the combat spaces aboard ship during operations, and having worked closely with the radar guys in carrying out my own duties, i knew then and know now that the capabilities afforded by these system are exceptional, to say the least. i have believe that they were fully aware of this aircraft flying right up our wake and directly overhead the battle group. 

attached sketch: i've attempted to illustrate using powerpoint what the aircraft looked like as it passed directly overhead, including overlaying a light gray matting and using transparency to depict the haze caused by the heat and humidity that day. these sketches are based on my 'minds eye' recollection of the aircraft's position, the approximate time of day, estimated direction of travel, and the suns position relative to my own. 

note: i only list myself, 1, as the total number of witnesses for this report because, although there were several other guys around me at the time of the sighting that i know also saw the aircraft, i was not part of the ship's crew, did not know them personally, and we all seemed to go our separate ways once the exercise activities were completed. i believe it is possible that many, many others that day witnessed the same thing.
content.summary: Black flying triangle with three very bright “lights” in corners, flying n/ne at 8000 feet altitude over persian gulf in 1992

content.detailedDescription:
Monday, july 28, 2014
i began watching the sky for an iridium satellite flare (listed as iridium 84 on my smart phone app), which was predicted to peak at 21:39:17 at elevation 63 degrees and azimuth 97 degrees at my home location at approximately 45 seconds before the flare was to peak (i had been alerted by a 1 min alarm on my app and walked outside).  at almost the same time that the iridium satellite became visible moving north to south, i observed another object, moving approximately from 300 degrees to 120 degrees, at an elevation similar to that of the iridium satellite.  this object was a single, large, white pinpoint, quite bright, moving at a constant speed.  it moved across the sky much faster than the satellite, but much slower than any meteor i have seen.  it covered approximately 60 degrees of sky before fading from view in the light pollution or passing into the earth���s shadow at an approximate angle of elevation of 40 degrees.  the elapsed time of observation was approximately 10 seconds, beginning approximately 10 degrees from zenith, crossing at or near zenith, and fading.  there was no sound, no appearance of a trail of any kind, and no indication of a debris trail.  

sky condition was very slight haze, sufficient to obscure dim stars, but bright stars were visible.  light pollution to the east of my location fading at approximately 40 degrees elevation.  sunset at my location was at 20:51; eect 21:11, eent 21:43, eeat 22:10 (from a smart phone app).  moonset at my location was at 21:43 (according to gps).  moon phase was two days past new.

this object was unlike any meteor i have seen.  it covered the sky much too fast to have been any aircraft that i am familiar with.  it had disappeared just prior to the iridium satellite flare peak.  the iridium satellite was predicted to reach a magnitude of -8.5.  the unidentified object was of constant magnitude somewhat less than that, although still bright, i estimate it roughly at magnitude -4.0.

at the time of the observation, the sun angle was still such that the iridium 84 satellite was illuminated by the sun; if the unidentified object was illuminated by the sun, it had to be at an altitude similar to that of iridium 84.  i could not tell if it was self-illuminated.
 
i have never seen anything comparable to this unidentified object.  the speed with which it covered approximately 60 degrees of arc across the sky was incompatible with any object that i have previously observed; too fast to be a satellite or aircraft, too slow for a meteor or space junk. there was no variation in magnitude and no visible signs of trailing debris.  there was no sound of propulsion or sonic shock.  it was inconsistent with any of those phenomena from my prior observations. 
 
i have been observing the sky for over 50 years.  i regularly observe passes of the international space station and other visible satellites.  i regularly observe meteor showers.  i consider myself an extraordinarily qualified observer, having experience in civilian aviation, military operations, scientific data collection, and field surveying.
content.summary: Observed object passing overhead while watching for iridium flare.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi 
all fiends i am manjeet singh
this happens with me in 2004 but i never tell any body except my mom and my wife because people laugh on such thing in india . i daily use to wake up at 4:30 am in morning during collage time and go to local stadium for jogging every day . it was winters in india at that time very little fog and little fog clouds in the sky with moon . it was a nice climate . i reached in the stadium at 5 am and did some warmup . then i saw lots of bright lights with blue in colour and few with red and yellow . if i say the number its 100+ blue and around 20 + red and yellow. its was a very huge plane with triangle like shape but not complete fully triangle. it appears coming straight from
north west direction i watch it more then 30 seconds coming very slowly towards me after coming over my head i watched it clearly it was bigger than a football ground then it slowly proceed towards southeast gain some height and gone like magic .I cant believe what i see such a huge flying plane with no sound and lots of lights. i stunned for few minutes i sit on ground just trying to tell my self is it a plane or what .Then i runaway from there towards my home and didn't return to stadium for next 6 or 7 days in early morning .  i want to know weather any one else experience such thing . 
i dont have any photo but it was like a triangle
content.summary: Its like v shape very large in size with lots of blue lights and few yellow & red , without noise but very huge in size.

content.detailedDescription: The day before i was unusually overwhelmingly exhausted. the next morning when i woke up it was almost robotic. i rose up, took y dog out, got on my bike to prepare for my usual morning ride, and for the oddest unknown reason i just stopped riding and looked up to the left, and blam! a little ball of what looked to be a baby sun ball or a mass energy ball time traveling. i was jaw dropped! it hid behind a few trees and was playing what i considered peek a boo! i said "this is happening, this is amazing! please take me with you! and it came out from behind the trees and just hovered like "let us talk about it...!" i felt an urge to get to y friends my energies were going wild i could see peoples auras through houses! it began to follow me i was again ja dropped! this is happening! so to test my theory i rode back to the starting area, it followed me back!  so i continued up the road in the other direction again to my friends house, blew through the door like someone was dying and said everyone get outside u have to see this! my aliens are here they are playing with me as i flew to the back door and out into the back yard where the house of people also followed me and we watched it do circles and hover! it stayed long enough for me to explain what happe ! the kids were mind blown just as well as the adults! my energies and powers were so intense and overwhelming! at one point colors almost overtook everything around me! i could see areas through houses of the people and houses themselves emitted energy as a whole! as we stood there appreciating this exceptionally rare moment it took off in a straight line faster than light i assume. it looked as if it shot itself out of the county and just as big as it was just poof! like into the next portal of travel! it was so so very amazing, intriguing, enlightening! this little ball of fire was very curios and playful, or well experienced and knowledgeable in so many planes of the universe!....Just such an amazing experience for its interest in me.....Gah! simply appreciated in so many ways!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Fireball blew out of a portal and "played"/followed me back and forth!

content.detailedDescription:
2:30 pm. 7/28/14

i just witnessed an object in the sky in mt.Shasta, ca. the location was at lake siskiyou camp resort. i witnessed the object from the beach looking out the window of my cooking truck. the object looked like a piece of mercury or metal drop in the sky. the object was reflective but it wasn���t from lights coming from the object. it looked like it was reflecting the sun. the object looked out of place which caught my eye. i stared at the object for about 15 seconds. it didn���t move like an aero plane or helicopter. it moved like a mouse on a computer screen but in a perfect straight line. i was losing sight of the object from the window, where i'm at the sky is wide open. at is a partly cloudy day, but there were no clouds in the path of the object. i ran outside to try and track the object. when i ran around the corner to look in the direction of mt.Shasta where it looked like the path in the sky that the object was traveling it was gone. at the speed that the object was traveling i still should have been able to see it in the sky if it was a plane or helicopter. it was just gone. the object made no noise. it just looked out of place like it wasn���t flying in the sky but almost like it was a fly on a tv screen, part of the view you���re looking at but not in the screen? i looked around at all of the people on the beach, but it didn���t look like anyone was looking up at the sky. this is my 4th object i���ve seen in this area that i would say is a ufo. first one i���ve seen in the day.
content.summary: Ufo sighting mt.Shasta, ca

content.detailedDescription: At 11:30 p.M. my brother and i drove to a nearby lake know as devil's creek. we were there for about 25 minutes talking about personal problems when we saw a brightening orb that moved slowly at first. we initially thought that it was an asteroid. it then immediately increased in speed and curved downward until it seemed to explode over the nearby town of weston. the explosion was so brilliantly bright that it lit up the entire lake as though it was daytime. immediately following the incident, an extraordinary amount of planes began to swarm to the area. within the following 15 i counted over 20 planes and two helicopters. the helicopters flew so low, the lights pulsating on them lit up the area around us. we noticed that after the sighting the sky around the mountains and directly above the "crash" pulsed with light. it looked as though smoke were dissipating within a number of milliseconds. i was flabbergasted. it has been my first time seeing anything. since then i have a fear of sleep or the subject of extra-terrestrials. i am afraid to close my eyes, whereas previously i enjoyed the discussion of inter-planetary life. i was changed emotionally and i have definitely changed in my personal beliefs on this subject.
content.summary: Whitish, blueish orb of light

content.detailedDescription: It was right at 11:30pm in north west,san antonio, texas when i was out helping my daughter in-law put my grand kids in her car when a light hovering about 500ft away got my attention, just when i ask myself what could it be since there was no noise then it shot straight up about 100ft or so and did a 90 degree right at a very high rate of speed and of course it was then gone. i simply ask myself i know a shooting star does not go up so i know what i saw. just thought i would report this to see if i was the only one to see this. i hope there is others who can confirm this with me.
content.summary: Glowing white circle of light
Ufo real was
Ufo real was

content.detailedDescription:
I was living in burlingame in a studio apartment that was converted to a one bedroom.  there was indoor/outdoor carpet in the apartment.  i had a cat.  i was laying in bed one night reading.  the cat was not in the room with me.  the cat made a certain sound when he walked along the carpet.  and, i heard a sound that was not my cat.  i could hear the footsteps and they were definitely not my cat.  i saw the clock and it was around 11 p.M.  my heart started racing, and i threw my head under the covers.  i was screaming in my head because nothing was coming out of my mouth that they should leave me alone of i would die.  my heart was pounding so hard in my chest that i thought it would explode.  

the next thing i know, it was as if the cat was dropped on my stomach.  i say this because as soon as he hit my belly he ran out of the room.  i found myself lying there in the bed.  my body was straight.  the blanket was pulled up to my armpits with my arms straight against my body. i looked at the clock and saw that it was around 3:00 a.M.  i would have thought that this is how someone wakes up in the hospital.

now i have to say that i am known to wreck a bed.  i do not sleep in one place and am a stomach sleeper.  my blankets and sheets every night are a total mess, so waking up as i did was unusual.

i discovered a triangular mark on my shin.  it resembles a freckle but this was not there before.

i would love to know what happened in my missing time.  i would be willing to be hypnotized.  i do not think that this is a first encounter.  that is just the feeling i have.
content.summary: I know that i was abducted.  what happened was too weird.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of where i work and looked up when i noticed an object reflecting the sunlight over a nearby building. i could tell that it it was moving because it would glint every so often in different areas of the object. at first i thought, silver birthday balloons that got away. but i kept watching it since it was slightly windy, and considering the altitude it was at, it wasn't floating away, it was staying in the same place. it hovered over a building much less than a quarter mile away and eventually hovered away until i lost sight of it behind a building. the entire sighting lasted nearly 5 minutes, and there were several witnesses. no one could really figure out what they were seeing, even myself. i ran inside my building, grabbed the office camera, and was able to take many images of the object. in reviewing the images, the most amazing thing about it is that the object seemingly takes on several radical shapes and splits into pieces. so many different shapes in fact, that in almost every picture, it takes on a different shape, radically different from the other. how could this be for an object that could still move around and hover? it eventually hovered in the opposite direction from where i was standing and i lost sight of it as it went behind the building closest to me.
content.summary: A shape-shifting metallic craft observed for 5 minutes

content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering

content.detailedDescription: Line of unknown lights  and a larger brighter light further off away in the distance.  reports made to police who commented they would not be investigating.  all news reports do not report any investigations. reports on on city tv and ctv news.  also in toronto star newspaper..  hundreds of witnesses.   event lasted over 2hour

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:00pm pst from the window of my office building myself and 4 other co-workers witnessed what we believe to be a ufo.  the object was white in color with no apparent windows or wings.  it was a solid cylindrical object.  it was traveling at a fast rate of speed as compared to the airplanes that were landing at mccarran international airport.  the planes were going west and the ufo was traveling in a se direction from the nw. we observed the ufo travel for a good 15-20 minutes.
content.summary: White cylindrical object going from nw to se near mccarran airport with planes landing nearby
